title: "Hochfrequenzelektrizität und Lichtkuren in der Heilung"
first_phrase: This is the last part of a text discussing the use of high-frequency electricity in medical treatment. The author explains that properly applied high-frequency electricity can produce a pleasant, warming feeling without any discomfort. However, if the electrodes are not properly placed, sparks can result, leading to discomfort. The author highlights the many benefits of high-frequency electricity for treating various conditions, but warns against overuse and emphasizes the importance of using safe devices. The section also briefly touches on the use of light therapy for medical treatment.
